ygData.subject: Re: Poison, vials, pottery and a SPOILER at the bottom
ygData.msgSnippet: as far as i know, i was using high quality firing sheets, and it worked fine for both normal and lined vials.... Xillitil/Povar
ygData.messageBody:
as far as i know, i was using high quality firing sheets, and it worked fine
for both normal and lined vials....

Xillitil/Povar

>
>From: BrainBoss@...
>
>In a message dated 7/30/99 10:28:39 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
>jmiser@... writes:
>
><< The one problem i had was trying to fire it, i would use 1 unfired vial
>and 1 firing sheet, and with all 3 types of firing sheets, i get the these
>do not combine into anything usefull. >>
>
>
>Some pottery items (well, just the smoker, I think) require more than one
>firing sheet so that may be the problem.
>
>Amhran Fasach, gypsy bard of the Soerbaird
